author: mrodozov
body:
Resolves: #1 
this is fixing the python version and the function resolves the libname:
```
<tool name="boost_python" version="1.75.0-7ec380acc684ed293be057bf1a447fce">
  <info url="http://www.boost.org"/>
  <lib name="boost_python38"/>
  <client>
```
also adds a script for the python related variables (we can add what we need later)
title: Fix Boost python version and add python script
